title: 718 90 "Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver!"Transliteration: "Daichi Ōdan - Kyozō Pīka Kishū Sakusen!" (Japanese:大地横断 巨像ピーカ奇襲作戦！) Kentarō Fujita Tomohiro Nakayama November 15, 2015(2015-11-15) April 13, 2025
transformers_text: 718 90 Moving Across the Ground The Giant Statue Pica's Surprise Maneuver Transliteration D aichi dan Ky oz P ka Kish Sak use n Japanese Kenta r Fujita Tomohiro Nakayama November 15 2015 2015 11 15 April 13 2025 Luffy continues facing down Bellamy but still refuses to fight back On the fourth level Pica questions Kyro s and Rebecca about King Riku Kyro s declares Riku both family and his own personal savior and says that the people of Dress rosa still hope for his return to the throne Upon hearing this Pica disappears and descends to the lower levels attacking the wounded fighters He emerges back with his massive stone body and begins marching toward the King's Plateau to kill King Riku causing widespread destruction in the process Enraged by Pica's cowardliness Zoro tries to come up with a plan to stop him from reaching the plateau He concludes that a long range slash would be too weak jumping on to Pica is physically impossible and that warning Us opp and the others is futile due to the distance and him losing his own personal Transponder Snail Concluding there's virtually no time for everyone on the plateau to evacuate regardless Zoro meets up with Sai Chin jao Baby 5 Orl umb us and Eliza bello He asks Eliza bello for two minutes to prepare and schemes up with a bold new plan launch himself into the sky and slice Pica up directly
tf_idf_text: move across ground giant statue pica surprise maneuver transliteration aichi dan kish sak use japanese kenta fujita tomohiro nakayama november april luffy continue face bellamy still refuse fight back fourth level pica question kyro rebecca king riku kyro declare riku family personal savior say people dress rosa still hope return throne upon hear pica disappears descend low level attack wound fighter emerge back massive stone body begin march toward king plateau kill king riku cause widespread destruction process enrage pica cowardliness zoro try come plan stop reach plateau concludes long range slash would weak jumping pica physically impossible warn opp others futile due distance lose personal transponder snail conclude there virtually time everyone plateau evacuate regardless zoro meet sai chin jao baby orl umb eliza bello ask eliza bello two minute prepare scheme bold new plan launch sky slice pica directly
